name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru performing the song 'Closing' on a stage decorated with clouds, stars, and a rainbow. The song is emotional and energetic.
Post-performance sequence. Kobo poses on stage while the audience cheers. Transition to the MC segment.
MC segment. Kobo talks to the audience about the performance, her new stage setup, and the 'Big Cheers' mascots. She concludes with a merchandise announcement.

subtitles.original: さぁ 顔を上げて
subtitles.english: Come on, raise your face.

subtitles.original: 歩み始めなきゃ
subtitles.english: I gotta start walking.

subtitles.original: リアルな私を気づいて
subtitles.english: Notice the real me.

subtitles.original: またあの季節 この空の下
subtitles.english: Again in that season, under this sky...

subtitles.original: 見上げている
subtitles.english: ...I am looking up.

subtitles.original: 傷ついたもの
subtitles.english: The things that were hurt...

subtitles.original: もう元には 戻らないけれど
subtitles.english: ...won't return to how they were, but...

subtitles.original: 離したくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to let go.

subtitles.original: 離れたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to be apart.

subtitles.original: もう諦めない
subtitles.english: I won't give up anymore.

subtitles.original: あなたの心 傷つけてでも
subtitles.english: Even if I hurt your heart...

subtitles.original: この気持ちに 嘘はつけない
subtitles.english: ...I can't lie to this feeling.

subtitles.original: いつか笑顔で 話せるような
subtitles.english: So that someday we can talk with smiles...

subtitles.original: 私を見つけて
subtitles.english: ...find me.

subtitles.original: 枯れそうにいて
subtitles.english: As if withering away...

subtitles.original: 聞かせてほしい 二度と一人にはしないと
subtitles.english: ...I want you to tell me that you'll never leave me alone again.

subtitles.original: 帰らない日々 抱きしめたまま
subtitles.english: Embracing the days that won't return.

subtitles.original: きっとそう きっと
subtitles.english: Surely, yes, surely.

subtitles.original: あの日の気持ち 受け止めないと
subtitles.english: I have to accept the feelings of that day...

subtitles.original: 前に進むことができない
subtitles.english: ...or I can't move forward.

subtitles.original: 離したくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to let go.

subtitles.original: 離れたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to be apart.

subtitles.original: 一つの願いは
subtitles.english: My one wish is...

subtitles.original: 大好きだよと 伝えたいだけ
subtitles.english: ...just to tell you "I love you."

subtitles.original: 本当 素直じゃないけれど
subtitles.english: Really, I'm not honest though.

subtitles.original: So... How is it guys?
subtitles.english: So... How is it guys?

subtitles.original: That was "Closing"... Do you take a lot of screenshot?
subtitles.english: That was "Closing"... Do you take a lot of screenshots?

subtitles.original: And ah! How about my new stage? Woah!
subtitles.english: And ah! How about my new stage? Woah!

subtitles.original: It's very cloudy here.
subtitles.english: It's very cloudy here.

subtitles.original: Yeah as you can see, there's two BIG CHEERS on the left and right.
subtitles.english: Yeah as you can see, there's two BIG CHEERS on the left and right.

subtitles.original: みんな、どうだった？こぼのパフォーマンス。
subtitles.english: How was it everyone? Kobo's performance.

subtitles.original: いっぱいスクリーンショット撮れたかな？
subtitles.english: Did you take lots of screenshots?

subtitles.original: こぼの新しいステージはもうどうだった？かわいいでしょ？
subtitles.english: How was Kobo's new stage? Cute, right?

subtitles.original: ビッグ・チアーズがありますので、めっちゃかわいいよね。
subtitles.english: There are Big Cheers, so it's super cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: So actually, yeah, we're already at the end of the show guys, but...
subtitles.english: So actually, yeah, we're already at the end of the show guys, but...

subtitles.original: そろそろお別れ時間になりますよ。
subtitles.english: It's about time to say goodbye.

subtitles.original: But don't worry. Kobo still have something to share with you guys.
subtitles.english: But don't worry. Kobo still have something to share with you guys.

subtitles.original: まだ皆さんにお知らせがあります。
subtitles.english: I still have an announcement for everyone.

subtitles.original: Jan jan ja-jan!
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Kobo Kanaeru Special Birthday 2025 Merch Set!
subtitles.english: Kobo Kanaeru Special Birthday 2025 Merch Set!

subtitles.original: This time Kobo's birthday merch theme is... Jellyfish Princess...
subtitles.english: This time Kobo's birthday merch theme is... Jellyfish Princess...
